str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To begin, am, exist, be in possession. From hupo and archomai; to begin under, i.e. Come into existence; expletively, to exist (verb).
Evil, bad, wicked, malicious, slothful.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To know, remember, appreciate.
To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
A primary word; 'good'.
A gift, present. From the base of didomi; a present.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
A child, descendent, inhabitant. From the base of timoria; a child.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Dative Neuter Singular
str2: How much, how great, how many. From an absolute pos and hos; interrogative pronoun how much (plural) many).
More, rather. Neuter of the comparative of the same as malista; more) or rather.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
Wind, breath, spirit.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: To ask, request, petition, demand. Of uncertain derivation; to ask.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
